New Records: Dinesh Karthik smashed a maiden fifty in Twenty20 internationals
Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik smashed 55 from 27 deliveries to produce late fireworks as India posted 169-6 in their 20 overs
South Africa got off to a horrible start in their chase when captain and opener Temba Bavuma retired hurt after suffering blows to his hand and body
Quinton de Kock departed soon after when he was run out -- leaving South Africa a mountain too steep to climb
Miscellaneous Highlights: India fast bowler Avesh Khan was the most successful with the ball for the hosts, making full use of the bounce on offer from the pitch to pick up 4-18

The hosts, playing the series without several frontline players including regular captain Rohit Sharma and batters Virat Kohli and KL Rahul, appeared headed for a below-par total in their must-win match
